<div class="grid-container">
    <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    {{#each colours}}

        <div class="cell small-6 medium-3 large-2">

            <div class="palette_item">

                <div class="palette_swatch" style="background-color:{{this.color}}">
                </div>
                <div class="palette_label">
                    <span class="palette_label__name">{{create_label this.label}}</span>
                    <span class="palette_label__hex">{{this.color}}</span>
                </div>

            </div>

        </div>

    {{/each}}
    </div>
</div>

  • Content: 
    .palette_item {
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
    margin-top: 1rem;
}

.palette_swatch {
    height: 50px;
}

.palette_label {
    background-color: #efefef;
    padding: 0.5rem;;
}

.palette_label__name,
.palette_label__hex  {
    display: block;
}

.palette_label__name {
    border-bottom: 1px dashed rgba(#444, 0.2);
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
    padding-bottom: 0.25rem;
    text-transform: uppercase;
}

.palette_label__hex {

}
